parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Conjunctive perfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To fall out, come to pass, become, be
Jehu -- 'the LORD is He', the name of several Israelites

parse: Verb - Hifil - Imperfect - third person masculine singular
Article | Verb - Nifal - Participle - masculine singular
str2: To be smooth, to escape, to release, rescue, to bring forth young, emit sparks
Drought, a cutting instrument, as a, knife, sword
Hazael -- 'God sees', a king of Aram (Syria)
Elisha -- 'God is salvation', a well-known Israelite prophet
